title: HAP 86 - French Connection - The Negritude Movement
itunes:title: HAP 86 - French Connection - The Negritude Movement
description: Our first look at the emergence of the Negritude movement in Paris in the 1930s, with a focus on the early leadership of the Nardal sisters and Leon Damas.
content:encoded: Our first look at the emergence of the Negritude movement in Paris in the 1930s, with a focus on the early leadership of the Nardal sisters and Leon Damas.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
